name: Coupl
headline: A neobank for couples in India
description:
Coupl is India's first neobank for couples. 
We help couples easily manage their shared payments.

While Indian couples have evolved over the last 20 years, the traditional joint account hasn't.

Today, young Indian couples start sharing payments well before tying the knot. They use multiple tools to budget, split, track and settle expenses. They also prefer a quick and digital banking experience. 
However, the traditional joint account is still only accessible to married couples, takes days to open and is very limited in its expense management features & user experience.

Coupl lets any young couple (regardless of their marital status) open a digital joint wallet in under 60 seconds using the mobile app - without ever having to visit a physical bank branch.
Customers can use the Coupl wallet to pool in money together and pay for shared expenses using our RuPay cards.

founders.name: Srinivas Sarkar, Founder
founders.description: Srini is an Indian tech entrepreneur ‚ö°Ô∏èHe is the co-founder & CEO of Coupl, India‚Äôs first neobank for couples, backed by Y Combinator. He was featured in Forbes 30 Under 30 Asia. He's an alum of BITS Pilani.

founders.name: Kushagra Manglik, Founder
founders.description:
Kushagra is the Co-Founder and COO of Coupl Money. He graduated with a Bachelor's degree in Electrical Engineering from IIT Kanpur in 2019. 

He was a Research Software Engineer at IBM Research for close to 2 years in their AI for Supply Chain team, building multiple production level APIs for some of the top retail companies in the lifestyle space. During his stint with IBM Research, he published multiple papers at Tier 1 Data Science conferences and has 6 patents to his name.

## India‚Äôs first neobank for couples
Joint wallets for modern couples
[![google play](https://coupl.money/images/google-play.png)](https://coupl.money/<https:/play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.couplapp>)[![app store](https://coupl.money/images/app-store.png)](https://coupl.money/<https:/apps.apple.com/us/app/coupl-shared-banking/id6449580815>)
Powered by
[![rupay](https://coupl.money/_next/image?url=%2Fimages%2Frupay.png&w=256&q=75)](https://coupl.money/</#>)[![npci](https://coupl.money/_next/image?url=%2Fimages%2Fnpci.png&w=256&q=75)](https://coupl.money/</#>)[![bbpl](https://coupl.money/_next/image?url=%2Fimages%2Fbharat.png&w=256&q=75)](https://coupl.money/</#>)
Create your Coupl wallet and earn up to **‚Çπ50,000** worth of joining rewards üî•
## Pool together, spend together
Use your joint wallet to pool your money, and your joint Coupl cards to spend on all that you do together
### Say goodbye to splitting transactions!
No more splitting every transaction! With the Coupl joint wallet, you and your partner can easily manage your shared expenses together from one account
![mobile](https://coupl.money/_next/image?url=%2Fimages%2Fmobilescreen.png&w=750&q=75)
### Lightning fast! It only takes 30 seconds to open your joint wallet
![timer](https://coupl.money/_next/image?url=%2Fimages%2Ftimer.png&w=750&q=75)
### Inclusive banking for all, because love knows no boundaries
![flag](https://coupl.money/_next/image?url=%2Fimages%2Fflag.png&w=640&q=75)
### Not hitched yet? Not a problem!
The Coupl joint wallet is open to you whether you're newly married, in a long-term relationship, or even just dating
![stars](https://coupl.money/_next/image?url=%2Fimages%2Fstars.png&w=256&q=75)
‚ÄúWe no more fighting over who pays for what, or how to settle it later! With Coupl, my wife and I easily manage money together and keep our shared expenses in sync.‚Äù 
Varun & Kritika, Mumbai
![kriva](https://coupl.money/_next/image?url=%2Fimages%2Fkriva.png&w=1080&q=75)
## How it works
![create wallet](https://coupl.money/_next/image?url=%2Fimages%2Fcreate-wallet-white.png&w=640&q=75)
Create your joint wallet on Coupl
![invite](https://coupl.money/_next/image?url=%2Fimages%2Finvite-white.png&w=640&q=75)
Invite your partner to join the wallet
![](https://coupl.money/_next/image?url=%2Fimages%2Fcards-white.png&w=640&q=75)
Get your matching cards
![pool](https://coupl.money/_next/image?url=%2Fimages%2Fpool-white.png&w=640&q=75)
Pool your money together, and start spending
## Joint Cards
![card gif](https://coupl.money/images/card-gif.gif)
Easily track and manage your cards and payments
![track manage](https://coupl.money/_next/image?url=%2Fimages%2Ftrack-mange.png&w=750&q=75)
Set up spending limits and alerts
![limits](https://coupl.money/_next/image?url=%2Fimages%2Flimit.png&w=1080&q=75)
One place to pay all your utility bills together
![together](https://coupl.money/_next/image?url=%2Fimages%2Ftogether.png&w=1080&q=75)
Keep your individual bank statements clean
![bank](https://coupl.money/_next/image?url=%2Fimages%2Fbank.png&w=1080&q=75)
![joint wallet coupl](https://coupl.money/_next/image?url=%2Fimages%2Fjointwallet-bg.jpg&w=2048&q=75)
## Joint wallet, shared rewards
We reward you every time you spend together. From complimentary airport lounge access to discounts on OTT subscriptions, hotel bookings, and much more.
![Zomato](https://coupl.money/_next/image?url=%2Fimages%2Fzomato.png&w=256&q=75)![Oyo](https://coupl.money/_next/image?url=%2Fimages%2Foyo.png&w=256&q=75)![Indigo](https://coupl.money/_next/image?url=%2Fimages%2Findigo.png&w=256&q=75)![BookMyShow](https://coupl.money/_next/image?url=%2Fimages%2Fbkmyshow.png&w=256&q=75)![MyTrip](https://coupl.money/_next/image?url=%2Fimages%2Fmytrip.png&w=256&q=75)![Netflix](https://coupl.money/_next/image?url=%2Fimages%2Fnetflix.png&w=256&q=75)![Taj](https://coupl.money/_next/image?url=%2Fimages%2Ftaj.png&w=256&q=75)![Home](https://coupl.money/_next/image?url=%2Fimages%2Fhome.png&w=256&q=75)![Pepperfry](https://coupl.money/_next/image?url=%2Fimages%2Fpaperfry.png&w=256&q=75)![UrbanLoader](https://coupl.money/_next/image?url=%2Fimages%2Furban.png&w=256&q=75)
## Backed by
[![Combinator logo](https://coupl.money/_next/image?url=%2Fimages%2Fcombinator-logo.png&w=640&q=75)](https://coupl.money/<https:/www.ycombinator.com/companies/coupl>)![Entrepreneur first logo](https://coupl.money/images/entrepreneur-first-logo.svg)
## Why couples love us
‚ÄúKeeping track of our finances was a pain until we discovered Coupl! A joint wallet that lets us easily combine our funds at the beginning of the month for our shared expenses has made our lives so much simpler.‚Äù
![avi](https://coupl.money/_next/image?url=%2Fimages%2Ftesti-avi.png&w=128&q=75)
![rebecca](https://coupl.money/_next/image?url=%2Fimages%2Ftesti-rebecca.png&w=128&q=75)
Avi & Rebecca
Dating, 2 years ‚ù§Ô∏è
"Kush and I love travelling, and Coupl has significantly improved the quality of our trips! Beyond just the travel rewards, it is also a huge relief to not have to keep track of who is responsible for every penny spent.‚Äù
![Kush](https://coupl.money/_next/image?url=%2Fimages%2Ftesti-kush.png&w=128&q=75)
![Lisha](https://coupl.money/_next/image?url=%2Fimages%2Ftesti-lisha.png&w=128&q=75)
Kush & Lisha
Dating, 3 years ‚ù§Ô∏è
‚ÄúWe recently tied the knot, and were looking for a stress-free way to manage our household expenses. We dreaded the tedious process of opening a joint account. That was until we discovered Coupl! Since then, it‚Äôs been super easy to pool our money, set a budget and stick to it.‚Äù
![Sanskar](https://coupl.money/_next/image?url=%2Fimages%2Ftesti-sanskar.png&w=128&q=75)
![Rishika](https://coupl.money/_next/image?url=%2Fimages%2Ftesti-rishika.png&w=128&q=75)
Sanskar & Rishika
Married, 3 months üíç
‚ÄúAs a same-sex couple, we face a very unique challenge when it comes to navigating through financial institutions! That‚Äôs when we came across Coupl and saw how they‚Äôre helping the queer community with their family banking needs. We were able to easily set up our Coupl account without ever visiting a physical bank!‚Äù
![Komal](https://coupl.money/_next/image?url=%2Fimages%2Ftesti-komal.png&w=128&q=75)
![Shilpa](https://coupl.money/_next/image?url=%2Fimages%2Ftesti-shilpa.png&w=128&q=75)
Komal & Shilpa
Together, 6 years üè≥Ô∏è‍üåà
![coupl logo white](https://coupl.money/images/coupl-logo-white.svg)![coupl logo white](https://coupl.money/_next/image?url=%2Fimages%2Flogo-radiul.png&w=256&q=75)
Coupl is India‚Äôs first neobank for young couples. With Coupl‚Äôs joint wallet & linked cards, couples can easily pool their money together and spend it (online and offline) for all their shared expenses without the need to set up a joint account. We are on a mission to create the most financially-savvy generation of couples, ever.
[![linkedin](https://coupl.money/images/linkedin.svg)](https://coupl.money/<https:/www.linkedin.com/company/coupl/>)[![linkedin](https://coupl.money/images/instagram.svg)](https://coupl.money/<https:/instagram.com/paywithcoupl>)[![linkedin](https://coupl.money/images/youtube.svg)](https://coupl.money/<https:/www.youtube.com/@CouplMoney>)
[![Play Store](https://coupl.money/images/playstore-light.svg)](https://coupl.money/<https:/play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.couplapp>)[![App Store](https://coupl.money/images/appstore-light.svg)](https://coupl.money/<https:/apps.apple.com/us/app/coupl-shared-banking/id6449580815>)

generated_description:
### Coupl: India‚Äôs First Neobank for Couples

**Overview**  
Founded in 2022 and incubated in the Y Combinator Batch S22, Coupl has emerged as India's pioneering neobank dedicated to modern couples. Located in Bengaluru, this eight-person team is on a mission to redefine how couples manage their shared finances, appealing not only to married partners but also to those in committed relationships or simply dating.

**The Problem**  
Traditionally, joint bank accounts in India have been mired in bureaucracy, available only to married couples and requiring cumbersome procedures and limited features. In contrast, modern relationships demand flexibility and ease, with couples often sharing expenses long before tying the knot. This disconnect between couples‚Äô needs and available banking solutions presented a ripe opportunity.

**The Solution**  
Coupl addresses this gap by allowing any couple to open a digital joint wallet in under 60 seconds through a streamlined mobile app‚Äîno physical bank visit required. With Coupl, couples can pool their funds and manage joint expenses using linked RuPay cards. This innovative model replaces the tedious process of tracking who owes what with a simple shared account that handles all expenses seamlessly.

**User Experience**  
Coupl emphasizes speed and inclusivity. Couples can easily set up their accounts, invite partners, and start spending together. The experience is designed specifically for today‚Äôs needs, combining financial management with relationship dynamics, thus creating a platform where love and finances meet harmoniously.

**Rewards and Benefits**  
Further enhancing the appeal, Coupl rewards users with perks for spending together. From discounts on travel to entertainment subscriptions, the platform enriches couples' shared experiences while managing their finances. 

**Community Focus**  
Coupl also makes it a point to cater to diverse relationships, including same-sex couples, by providing a hassle-free setup catering to unique family needs.

**The Future**  
As they scale, Coupl aims to empower a generation of financially savvy couples who can navigate shared expenses without the traditional banking hurdles. With backing from notable entities like Y Combinator, the potential for this neobank looks promising.

In essence, Coupl is reshaping how couples approach shared finances, making it faster, easier, and more relevant than ever. Check them out at [Coupl.money](https://coupl.money) to learn more about spending and saving together!
